document_data.name: ''Phylactery of Righteousness''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Phylacteries of righteousness''''' were [[magical item]]s that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate. They were only carried or used by [[holy slayer]]s.
document_data.Description: A ''phylactery of righteousness'' was actually a collection of sacred writings that were worn on the user's arm.
document_data.Powers: This item provided heightened combat skills against the "Unenlightened" or anyone who had offended the user's god.
